NLP Pipeline

Testing (tests/)

The NLP7 pipeline includes a full test suite written with pytest.

Test Organization

tests/
├── app/
├── classification/
├── cli/
├── config/
├── data/
├── train/
├── transcription/
├── utils/
└── conftest.py

Tests cover: - API endpoints - Inference logic - Logger and helper utilities - Emotion classification functions - Azure cloud clients

Examples

Run all tests:

pytest tests/

Run specific module:

pytest tests/app/test_predict.py

Configuration

  • pytest.ini includes base markers

  • conftest.py holds shared fixtures

  • Coverage is supported via .coveragerc

├── .coveragerc
├── pytest.ini
└── tests/
